summary: The Next Chapter of the LOST STORY Series! A Skyrim Machinima in progress...
descriptionHtml:

[img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/10/permissioncopy.png[/img]

[color=orange][size=4]A new adventure begins...this machinima will be better and more complete from the previous one. I push it to the limit to make an experience never seen before for all skyrim addicts! Thank you all for your support and for making your critisism, good or bad, you give me purpose to make the story more comprehensive and facinating with a more cinematic way! Enjoy all![/size][/color]
[color=red][size=4]*Only the trailer will be uploaded here---to see more visit my Channel[/size][/color]
author: V-LIFE movies
